code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SCREENS=['posting','monetization','upgrades','achievements','settings'];const NavBar=_ref=>{let{currentScreen,onNavigate}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{children:SCREENS.map(screen=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>onNavigate(screen),className:currentScreen===screen?'active':'',children:screen.charAt(0).toUpperCase()+screen.slice(1)},screen))});};export default NavBar;
